tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Greetings! The clinic hygiene is greatly maintained and special attention to sanitization of all visitors are taken care by the clinic staff.The doctor himself is well equipped with all safety and protective gear.The doctor is very polite and gentle, he interact with our child as a friend.The doctor examine both of our kids one at a time ensuring to provide personal attention to each.The doctor vaccinated our kids with great care and such a clinical precision that even our 3 years old doesn't even feel being poked\/pinch while getting vaccinated.Above all, the doctor with great attention and patience reviewed the miscellaneous Immunization Record that we have due to different cities and cards over the time, and given us apt advise and directions to follow, with all our queries being well answered.We are very very happy with the doctor and the clinic staff and also highly satisfied with the Do's and Don'ts measure being followed in current days. Be noted, the clinic also facilitates with digital record of child health and digital payment modes to reduce chances of contamination, if any, with physical carrier. Thank you, Dr. Vishal Vaidya for the care, our kid recalls you as \"Mr.DoctorUncle\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
We recently moved to Dwarka and weren’t able to identify a regular doctor for our 5 year old, having met two different doctors previously.
Dr. Vishal Vaidya was very good. He established a quick rapport with our child and also explained with patience various reasons for her recurring cough/cold and then zeroed down on her diagnosis. He also advised on her vaccination scheduled inherited from previous doctors and filled out her school medical chart as well.

We are happy with him and assured that our child is in good hands

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My visit to your clinic was really pleasant. It was my first visit. I was really scared to take my baby to clinic in covid -19 times. But when I visited Dr. Vishal's clinic all my worries vanished. Every thing was properly sanitised, whether it was chairs, benches, baby weighing machine. I felt safe. Dr. Vishal was very humble and cleared our doubts with proper explanation. His approach to the parents and the baby is very positive. Your caring and extra effort to make your patient comfortable is truly remarkable. Thank you 😊

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Vishal had been a Blessing for us ** ** ** *** **** ********** ***** *** **** ***** He’s an exceptional professional who handles children very politely and befriends them to find out the ACTUAL problem/ condition of the child. I have no doubts to take my children to him for consultation whenever they fall sick. His approach is very scientific with adaptive latest treatments in Paedetraic Deptt. 
Wishing you All the Very Good Luck and many laurels in your career. 
Thanks Dr Vishal. 
Gurminder Singh Saini
reply_text:
Your encouraging words will always help me in giving the best treatment to the child.
Thanks

tags: None
review:
** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ***** 

It's been good 5 years we are visiting the Dr the best thing about him is he pays attention and time in hearing issues and providing the solutions to them. 

He has become a family Dr to my kid. Best part is, he responds via call/msg to all our queries. I would suggest Dr. Vishal To everyone.

tags: None
review:
** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ***** ********** ** ******* 
We were very pleased with our experience with the Doctor.  For first time parents it's important you consult a right doctor for new born Care.

Dr vishal not just guided us in the journey of parenthood, he is always there to support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
" Wonderful person and competent doctor "

Dr. Vishal is one of the rarely found doctors who believe in bringing care to the patient, respect to the profession and compassion in the society .

He has always responded positively to all our concerns regarding our toddler of 1.5yrs of age.

RAREST OF RARE DOCTOR ---- recommended to all dotting parents and their beautiful kids.

regards,
Maj Akshay (F/O Master Adamya)

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Hello Dr.Vishal - Hope you r doing well.Nilesh is much better  now with your medication only and Fever is in stable state.Thanx a lot.You have been his saviour many times.As Nilesh is feeling some weakness now,can you pls suggest some tonic nd appetiser for him as he does not like to eat any thing apart frm fried food.Any requirement of calcium in his case,pls suggest.I hve sent you watsap msg also on which You can reply.Regards,Mother of Nilesh.
reply_text:
Good to know Nilesh is doing well. You can give him 
Syp bevon 5 ml once daily for 1 month
Syp gemcal p 5 ml morning and night for 1 month 
Both after food

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: he is very polite and most importantly friendly with kids.He will make u understand all ur doubts very clearly. He will listen all problems and give u a perfect solution...he don't prescribe for every small small things he will advise some sort of cure for ur doubts w/o medicines also....children are safe in his hand I feel....
reply_text: Thanks for your feedback. I really appreciate your recommendation and will try to maintain the same standards of care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My Daughter wasn’t keeping well. Dr Vishal with his intelligence and experience in his profession as Paediatric; he could diagnose accurately the problem and give my daughter the correct medicines. My daughter is showing very good signs of improvement. I’ve recommended the Dr to my other family members too who are also very satisfied with the treatment. Happy that we met Dr Vishal who’s been a saviour to us whenever my daughter has fallen sick. Thanks to Dr Vishal.

review: Doctor is expert in handling kids. His presence makes kids very comfortable. He discusseses in detail every minute issue and gives worthy solutions. Advises more on prevention and always suggest home remedies. My kids were cured everytime and very rarely we needed to visit him second time. I have often disturbed him at odd hours and even on holiday, but he has offered remedial prescription without any hesitation. Overall a great doctor and human being

Doctor patiently answered all our questions and expalined things well. It was an overall nice experience with Dr. Vishal. Hoping to have an continued good exprerience in our next visits.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr.Vishal has been extremely accommodating esp at a time when doctors don't pay heed to your requirement and just jump to conclusions.

About a fortnight ago son had eaten plastic button, he not only guided us well but also ensured there was no panic which alleviated major physiological pain that we had at that point in time.. it's not always the medicine but the overall treatment meted out.. 

I can go on and on... 

Best man and a super doctor to your all the kid(s) issues...

I especially loved how Dr. Vishal really took his time to explain my child conditions with me as well as their treatment options. I had a great visit and the doctor’s demeanor has really put me at ease so I highly recommend this

His prompt attention at any time is commendable.
Also staff guesture is also very nice.
